primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God breaks through the human world to manifest His presence and victory over evil, transforming human fear into peace through the mediation of Christ/Angels.

subject.identificatie: God / The Commander of the Lord's Host
tekstueel_bewijs: Angels appear at the pure will of God and for no other cause.
The divine world has broken through into this one.

object.identificatie: The manifestation of divine presence and the 'Yes' of God's promises.
tekstueel_bewijs: The angels exist only to manifest the divine presence and purpose.
All the promises of God find their Yes in him.
They exist only to direct our attention to God.

ontvanger.identificatie: The fearful/suffering human (Joshua, Gideon, the congregation).
tekstueel_bewijs: The Lord protects his children from his judgment with his own compassion.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver (the one in the 'fiery furnace').

helper.identificatie: Angels / Jesus Christ (as the fourth man in the fire).
tekstueel_bewijs: The angel of his presence saved them.
He is with us in the flame.
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject who acts through these Helpers.

tekstueel_bewijs: God has a case against us.
Michael and his angels fighting against the dragon.
The angel of death is no match for the resurrection.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but 'The Dragon' and 'Death' itself, requiring a divine Subject.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human response to divine grace: moving from self-centered angel-worship to service of the needy.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: Ethics (soup kitchens) is presented as the proper fruit/test of truly encountering the Biblical God rather than a means to earn His favor.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: God → Divine Presence/Peace → The Suffering Church
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → The Salvation of His Children

voorbeelden_god_subject: The angel of his presence saved them.
God's angel comes to feed and restore him.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: If people want to get in touch with their angels...

voorbeelden: It’s time to call a halt.
Christian people need to be a lot less focused on angel sightings.
America is in the throes of angel worship.
If people want to get in touch with their angels...
In order to understand what angels are, we need to understand what they are not.
Satan is no match for the commander.
The angel of death is no match for the resurrection.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'Ability' (Pouvoir) to save and overcome, rather than the hearer's 'Obligation' (Devoir).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the 'Cute' (~S1) to the 'Terrible' (S2), then through the 'No' (~S2) to the final 'Yes' (S1).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God's judgment is 'encased in his mercy' through Christ.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High. Rilke's 'Every angel is terrible' is used to establish the necessity of grace.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon consistently places God as the active Subject of salvation and Christ as the one who overcomes the cosmic opponents (Death/Satan).

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Ethical imperative linked to social services
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: They’d be a lot better off working at a soup kitchen.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: Subject-switch to Christ in the furnace
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: He is with us in the flame.
All the promises of God find their Yes in him.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures (Joshua, Gideon, Elijah) are depicted as passive recipients of divine intervention rather than models to imitate.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God saves Elijah; God meets Joshua.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic grace: God acts, man receives.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the critique of New Age angels to the 'Terrible' Biblical angel to the 'Yes' in Christ is seamless.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Michael and his angels fighting against the dragon... that great dragon was thrown down.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses more on Christological presence than Pneumatological indwelling.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe: 'God has a case against us.'

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is powered by God's initiative. The hearer is positioned as a beneficiary of a cosmic victory.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a classic grace structure.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in maintaining God as the Subject while addressing contemporary cultural idols.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric would look at the use of the Time magazine hook, semiotics reveals that the 'engine' of the sermon is the Subject-switch from the 'cute angel' (human projection) to the 'Commander' (divine reality).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis might focus on the Hebrew of Joshua 5; semiotics focuses on how the 'Commander' functions as the Helper/Subject for the modern hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'No' of God is a modal negation of human 'Savoir' (knowing/categorizing), which prepares the way for God's 'Pouvoir' (saving power).

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids 'Exemplarism' by treating Joshua not as a hero to follow, but as a man confronted by a God who refuses to be an instrument of human agendas.
